author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp – Go to http://betterhelp.com/super to get 10%
off your first month.

🎟️ Through the Griffin Door LIVE Tour — Southwest 2025
https://supercarlinbrothers.com/events/ 

Today Ben dives into the Wizarding World of Harry Potter to break down one of the most quietly devastating moves Tom Riddle ever made: the infamous Defense Against the Dark Arts Curse. From the snowy night he returned to Hogwarts to hide the diadem, to the ripple effects that shaped entire generations of undertrained witches and wizards, this “petty revenge curse” may actually be Voldemort’s most effective long-term strategy in the entire series.

#HarryPotter #SuperCarlinBrothers #JvsBen

Written by: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by: Isybelle Christley

Southwest Tour Dates: 
3/07: Denver, CO - Chapter 33: Fight and Flight
3/09: Salt Lake City, UT - Chapter 34: The Dept of Mysteries
3/11: Las Vegas, NV - Chapter 35: Beyond the Veil
3/12: Phoenix, AZ- Chapter 36: The Only One He Ever Feare
title: The Defense Against the Dark Arts Curse — Voldemort’s Greatest Plan
